Jacuzzi, Swimming pool, Sauna, Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Internet, Telephone, Satellite, Alarm System, Heating system: central, gas, Hot water: gas 
 For sale, rent or gage a new four-storied house located in Tbilisi, in an ecologically clean area of a prestigious district in 7 minutes walk from the Freedom square. Newly built house (near the Mtatsminda park) has: 6 bedrooms, 5 toilets, 2 halls, 1 gym, 1 sauna, 1 cellar, 2 kitchens, 1 terrace, 1 balcony, 1 boiler, 1 garage.. Also it has a fully equipped garden, alarm system, indoor and outdoor pool, sauna, summer kitchen and garden. Besides, utilities belong to owner, and gives him a right to permit connection. This right brings an additional substantial income. Four storey house can be changed on real estate+amount of money.
Building area: 483 sq.m Plot: 600 sq.m
For Rent: 3400$ For sale: 350 000$
